titles: To the Right Honourable, Sir Robert Clayton, Lord-Mayor of the city of London the humble petition of the common-hall assembled.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Clayton, Robert, Sir, 1629-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Petition to remove Sir George Jefferies from position of recorder of the city of London.
keywords: London (England) --  Officials and employees --  Dismissal of.
